sense.def:
To extract something from a place
pomeni nekaj vzeti ali potegniti;

seg.quote: Mrs Oliver extracted a small notebook from her bag.

sense.def:
To extract a raw material
pomeni dobiti surovino iz zemlje ali jo ločiti od neke druge snovi.

seg.quote: The Japanese extract ten million tons of coal each year.

sense.def:
To extract information from someone
pomeni od nekoga s težavo dobiti podatke.

seg.quote: Sir James had extracted from Francis a fairly detailed account.
They will extract the maximum propaganda value from this affair.

sense.def:
An extract from a piece of writing or music
je krajši del zapisa ali skladbe, natisnjen ali odigran posebej.
